text:
A small typo in Ant 1.5.4 documentation, I think.

In the FileSet documentation page, in the "attributes" table, one is listed 
as "includes".  Correct syntax appear to be "include".

I guess this apply to "excludes" as well.

First post in BugZilla, feel free to let me know if I did something stupid.
creator: jeanmarc.ranger@smisrd.com
antoine@apache.org
text:
Hi,
no this is not a problem.
There are the includes and excludes attributes, which can contain several
patterns separated by commas and spaces, and the include and exclude nested
elements, which also contain patterns, but this time one by one.
So I am closing your report as INVALID.
This should not discourage to post new problems in bugzilla if you encounter any
further difficulty.
Antoine
